description:
Procella`s You Hazuki and Gravi`s Koi Kisaragi are asked to appear as guests at the high school student dance contest "High School Dance Colosseum (AKA DanColo)."
The two of them are selected to form a special group with Tsubasa Okui of SolidS, Kensuke Yaegashi of Growth, and Ruka Nazumi of ROCK DOWN, and You is appointed team leader.
Source: crunchyroll
